```{r}
library(tidyverse)
df_gss<-read_csv("http://www.itk.ilstu.edu/faculty/jrwolf/gss200.csv")
```


```{r}
str(df_gss)
```

```{r}
head(df_gss, 5)
tail(df_gss,5)
```
```{r}
library(ggplot2)
num5 <- ggplot(df_gss, aes(race, realrinc, fill = race))

num5+ stat_summary(fun.y = mean, geom = "bar") +  

stat_summary(fun.data = mean_cl_normal, geom = "errorbar", 
                            width = 0.2) + 
facet_wrap( ~ female) +
labs(x = "Race", y = "Income") + ggtitle("Real Income, Race and Gender") +
theme(legend.position="none")




```

```{r}
number8 <- ggplot(df_gss, aes(female, realrinc))

number8 + geom_boxplot() + 
labs(x = "Gender", y = "Income (in 1000's") + ggtitle("Real Income and Gender")



```
